languages.text: "Как хочешь". {n}Джай мягко улыбается.{/n} "Я готова быть твоей женой или наложницей. Мне не нужна свадьба, мне нуж{mf|ен|на} только ты".
"As you wish." {n}Jae smiles softly.{/n} "I will be your wife or your concubine. I do not need a wedding. All I need is you."
languages.original_text: "Как хочешь". {n}Джай мягко улыбается.{/n} "Я готова быть твоей женой или наложницей. Мне не нужна свадьба, мне нуж{mf|ен|на} только ты".

traits.locale_text: "As you wish." {n}Jae smiles softly.{/n} "I will be your wife or your concubine. I do not need a wedding. All I need is you."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "As you wish." {n}Jae smiles softly.{/n} "I will be your wife or your concubine. I do not need a wedding. All I need is you."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “如你所愿。”{n}婕伊轻柔地笑了。{/n}“我可以做你的妻子，也可以做你的小妾。我不要什么婚礼，我只要你。”
languages.original_text: "As you wish." {n}Jae smiles softly.{/n} "I will be your wife or your concubine. I do not need a wedding. All I need is you."

traits.locale_text: “如你所愿。”{n}婕伊轻柔地笑了。{/n}“我可以做你的妻子，也可以做你的小妾。我不要什么婚礼，我只要你。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「仰せのままに」{n}ジェイは柔らかく微笑む。{/n}「あたしがあんたの妻か、妾になってあげる。式はいらない。必要なのは、あんただけ」
languages.original_text: "As you wish." {n}Jae smiles softly.{/n} "I will be your wife or your concubine. I do not need a wedding. All I need is you."

traits.locale_text: 「仰せのままに」{n}ジェイは柔らかく微笑む。{/n}「あたしがあんたの妻か、妾になってあげる。式はいらない。必要なのは、あんただけ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Como desee». {n}Jae sonríe suavemente.{/n} «Seré su esposa o su concubina. No necesito bodas. Solo le necesito a usted».
languages.original_text: "As you wish." {n}Jae smiles softly.{/n} "I will be your wife or your concubine. I do not need a wedding. All I need is you."

traits.locale_text: «Como desee». {n}Jae sonríe suavemente.{/n} «Seré su esposa o su concubina. No necesito bodas. Solo le necesito a usted».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Tout ce que vous voudrez, {n}répond Jae en souriant avec douceur.{/n} Je serai votre épouse ou votre concubine. Je n'ai pas besoin d'un mariage. Tout ce qui compte, c'est vous. »
languages.original_text: "As you wish." {n}Jae smiles softly.{/n} "I will be your wife or your concubine. I do not need a wedding. All I need is you."

traits.locale_text: « Tout ce que vous voudrez, {n}répond Jae en souriant avec douceur.{/n} Je serai votre épouse ou votre concubine. Je n'ai pas besoin d'un mariage. Tout ce qui compte, c'est vous. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Wie Ihr wünscht." {n}Jae lächelt sanft.{/n} "Ich werde Eure Gattin oder Eure Konkubine sein. Ich brauche keine Hochzeit. Ich brauche nur Euch."
languages.original_text: "As you wish." {n}Jae smiles softly.{/n} "I will be your wife or your concubine. I do not need a wedding. All I need is you."

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr wünscht." {n}Jae lächelt sanft.{/n} "Ich werde Eure Gattin oder Eure Konkubine sein. Ich brauche keine Hochzeit. Ich brauche nur Euch."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "As you wish." {n}Jae smiles softly.{/n} "I will be your wife or your concubine. I do not need a wedding. All I need is you."

languages.text: "Nasıl dilersen." {n}Jae hafifçe gülümsüyor.{/n} "Eşin de olurum, cariyen de. Düğün istemem. Bana bir tek sen lazımsın."
languages.original_text: "As you wish." {n}Jae smiles softly.{/n} "I will be your wife or your concubine. I do not need a wedding. All I need is you."

traits.locale_text: "Nasıl dilersen." {n}Jae hafifçe gülümsüyor.{/n} "Eşin de olurum, cariyen de. Bir düğüne ihtiyacım yok. Tek ihtiyacım olan sensin."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
